title: The Dollar Bill Letter
subject: I've Taped a Dollar Bill to This Letter
author: Gary Halbert
body:
Dear Friend,

Yes, that really is a dollar bill taped to this letter.

No, it's not fake.

And no, I'm not crazy.

Well, maybe a little.

But here's why I did it:

I need your attention.

And I figured a dollar bill would get it.

See, I'm about to make you an offer that could literally change your financial future.

But only if you pay attention.

So I taped a dollar to this letter to make sure you'd read it.

Now, here's the deal:

That dollar you're holding?

It's the most important dollar you'll ever receive.

Because I'm about to show you how to turn that single dollar into hundreds - even thousands - of dollars.

No, this isn't some get-rich-quick scheme.

It's not MLM.

It's not crypto.

It's not investing in stocks.

It's direct mail.

Stay with me here.

You see, that dollar I sent you cost me about $1.50 when you include:

• The dollar itself ($1.00)
• Printing this letter ($0.15)
• The envelope ($0.05)
• Postage ($0.30)

So I'm out $1.50 just to get your attention.

Why would I do that?

Because I know something most business owners don't:

The right customer is worth HUNDREDS of dollars in lifetime value.

So spending $1.50 to acquire them is a bargain.

In fact, I'd happily spend $10, $20, even $50 to acquire a good customer.

Because I know they'll spend far more than that over time.

This is the secret of direct mail.

And it's the same secret that's made me and my clients millions of dollars.

Now, most business owners don't understand this.

They think: "I can't afford to spend money on marketing."

But the truth is:

You can't afford NOT to.

Every day you don't have a customer acquisition system is a day you're losing money.

Every competitor who DOES have a system is eating your lunch.

Every potential customer who never hears about you is buying from someone else.

So here's what I'm offering:

I've just finished a new book called "The Dollar Bill Secret."

It's 147 pages of pure, tested, proven direct mail strategies.

Including:

• How to calculate exactly how much you can afford to pay to acquire a customer (most people get this wrong and go broke)

• The "pattern interrupt" formula - 17 different ways to grab attention in the mailbox (the dollar bill is just one)

• The "lifetime value maximizer" - how to turn a $50 customer into a $5,000 customer over time

• Case studies of 9 businesses that used these techniques to go from struggling to thriving

• The complete "anatomy of a winning sales letter" - exactly what to say and in what order

• How to test small and scale big - so you never risk more than $500 proving a campaign

• The "response predictor" - how to know if your mail piece will work BEFORE you send it

Now, here's the price:

This book would normally sell for $97.

But because I already have your attention (thanks to that dollar bill), I don't need to work as hard to sell you.

So I'm offering it for just $47.

And here's my guarantee:

Read the book.

Use even ONE of the strategies.

If you don't make back at least 10 times your $47 investment in the next 90 days...

I'll refund your $47 AND let you keep the book.

You literally cannot lose.

To order, just fill out the enclosed form and mail it back with your payment.

Or call the number below to order by phone right now.

You'll get the book within 7 days.

And 90 days from now, you'll understand why I was willing to tape a dollar bill to a letter to get your attention.

Because the right customer is worth FAR more than a dollar.

And this book shows you how to find them.

Order now.

Your friend in profit,

Gary C. Halbert

P.S. Keep that dollar bill. Frame it. Put it on your wall. Let it remind you that every customer acquisition has a cost - and the businesses that understand this win. Everyone else loses.

analysis.selling_technique: Attention device + education + value demonstration + offer
analysis.contrarian_angle: Spending money to acquire customers is necessary, not wasteful

conversion_elements.social_proof: Personal credibility + case studies promised in book
conversion_elements.cta_strength: very strong - low price, strong guarantee (10x return or refund)
conversion_elements.guarantee: 10x ROI or full refund, keep the book
conversion_elements.specificity: Very high - exact costs, numbers, page count
conversion_elements.unique_mechanism: Physical dollar bill as attention device
